channel.title: Hello! Need Help! If you fix it... you can be admin on my server!
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I'm here to tell you about 6 errors that are bothering me! Ok, when i go into compile.bat in my file of the server and I press "C" in the code box to compile it always says this:
MessageHandler(2).java:5: class MessageHandler is public, should be declared in a file named MessageHandler.java public class MessageHandler ^ MessageHandler.java:5: duplicate class: MessageHandler public class MessageHandler ^ MessageHandler(2).java:111: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PlayerHandler location: class MessageHandler int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); ^ MessageHandler(2).java:112: cannot find symbol symbol : class client location: class MessageHandler client person = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; ^ MessageHandler(2).java:112: cannot find symbol symbol : class client location: class MessageHandler client person = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; ^ MessageHandler(2).java:112: package server does not exist client person = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; ^ 6 errors
Satan's Isle Has Been Compiled SuccesFull !
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Hello! Need Help! If you fix it... you can be admin on my server!
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Look how nooby I am ^

Wow… everyones a noob someday, also,

BUMPED

I’m aware that bumping is against the rules. So I might get muted, idc, showing a point and you should all know…

Read full topic

item.title: Hello! Need Help! If you fix it... you can be admin on my server!
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Hi everyone, I’m here to tell you about 6 errors that are bothering me! Ok, when i go into compile.bat in my file of the server and I press “C” in the code box to compile it always says this:

MessageHandler(2).java:5: class MessageHandler is public, should be declared in
a file named MessageHandler.java
public class MessageHandler
^
MessageHandler.java:5: duplicate class: MessageHandler
public class MessageHandler
^
MessageHandler(2).java:111: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable PlayerHandler
location: class MessageHandler
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
^
MessageHandler(2).java:112: cannot find symbol
symbol : class client
location: class MessageHandler
client person = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
^
MessageHandler(2).java:112: cannot find symbol
symbol : class client
location: class MessageHandler
client person = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
^
MessageHandler(2).java:112: package server does not exist
client person = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
^
6 errors

Satan’s Isle Has Been Compiled SuccesFull !

Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
